snippet.title: Gas Station Simulator: Early Days Prologue Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Don't forget to add Gas Station Simulator to your wishlist: https://bit.ly/GSSEarlyDays

Gas Station Simulator is all about renovating, expanding and running a gas station along a highway in the middle of nowhere USA. This prologue to the game serves as an introduction to the beginnings of it all, where you find an abandoned gas station, buy it and start renovating it in order to be able to service your first customers. That's why we call the prologue "Early Days".

#simulator #management #lifesim

Join Us:
TWITCH: https://bit.ly/DRAGOTwitch
YOUTUBE: https://bit.ly/DRAGOYouTube
FACEBOOK: https://bit.ly/gssdrago
INSTAGRAM: https://bit.ly/GssInsta
DISCORD: https://bit.ly/gssdiscord
